item.title: Pretty Vacant
item.description: [[songs/t/the_ghost_inside/dear_youth/with_the_wolves.md#whoa-theres-no-path-to-guide-me-the-more-i-give-in-the-more-it-haunts-me-vyl-wnanory|There’s no point in asking, you’ll get no reply]] [[songs/t/the_ghost_inside/dear_youth/with_the_wolves.md#whoa-theres-no-path-to-guide-me-the-more-i-give-in-the-more-it-haunts-me-vyl-wnanory|I just steam in but I don’t decide]] [[songs/t/the_ghost_inside/dear_youth/with_the_wolves.md#whoa-theres-no-path-to-guide-me-the-more-i-give-in-the-more-it-haunts-me-vyl-wnanory|I got no reason, it’s all too much]] [[songs/t/the_ghost_inside/dear_youth/with_the_wolves.
